data.author: Investing News Network
data.title: Nobel Resources Issued Diamond Drill Permits for Cuprita Project, Antofagasta Region, Chile
data.description: Nobel Resources Corp. (TSX – V: NBLC) (the “Company” or “Nobel”) is pleased to announce all necessary permits have been received to commence drilling at Cuprita (the “Project”) as early as November. This will be the first ever drill campaign at Cuprita. A notice was filed by the Company with the Copiapo office of Servicio Nacional de Geologia y Minera (SERNAGEOMIN) during the week of Oct 12th. The Company intends to move quickly and drill the highly perspective Cuprita project. The first phase of drilling on Cuprita is expected to include diamond drill holes drilled from eight...

data.author: Chris Roush
data.title: Senior editor Caruso departs Fox Business
data.description: Jay Caruso, a senior editor at Fox Business for the past three years, has left the news organization. Caruso is now communications and strategic initiatives director at Mair Strategies. Before Fox Business, Caruso was managing editor of the Washington Examiner magazine. He also was an editorial board member at the Dallas Morning News.
